title: Drifting Too Far From The Shore
description: "Chock full of humor, Drifting Too Far From the Shore is a beautiful story that makes you feel like you have been transported back to small town America."- Winston Groom, author of Forrest GumpReaders will fall in love with Muddy "Charlotte" Rewis, a sassy yet reserved southern woman who has a cane and ain't afraid to use it. Muddy believes she is in her last days and longs to reunite in heaven with her deceased husband, Claude, But when Muddy's grandson shoots out a neighbor's front window, an old friendship is renewed, and troubling mysteries irresistibly revived.Full of humorous moments, Drifting Too Far from the Shore is a wonderful story of small town American South and of making the most of life.
author: Niles Reddick
